_meanings:
{@--1@} To place or put
down, deposit.

{@--3@} To
make or deliver over, entrust, 
commit to the care of; <ls>Bg. 3. 30.</ls>

{@--5@} (Used 
intransitively) To resign the world, 
discard all worldly ties and 
attachments and become an anchorite,
{#saMdfSya kzaRaBaMguraM tadaKilaM Danyastu#}
